item.title: fb2k for the tangoDJ
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ duncan Foobar2000 just came out in version 0.9.6, making it a lot easier to configure for tangodjing purposes. I have written a short guide on how to configure fb2k for the tangoDJ. I will update the main article with new information, and suggestions for improvements are most welcome.
